price: Međutim, istinom suzbijamo laž, istina je uguši i laži nestane – a teško vama zbog onog što o Njemu iznosite!
arabic: بَلۡ نَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلۡبَٰطِلِ فَيَدۡمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٞۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡوَيۡلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: bal naqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿalā al-bāṭili fayadmaghuhu fa-idhā huwa zāhiqun walakumu al-waylu mimmā taṣifūna
